name: DropdownMenu.RadioItem

value * Required.description: The value of the radio item. When checked, the parent RadioGroup's value will be set to this value.
value * Required.description_zh: The value of the radio item. When checked, the parent RadioGroup's value will be set to this value.

disabled.description: Whether or not the radio menu item is disabled. Disabled items cannot be interacted with and are skipped when navigating with the keyboard.
disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the radio menu item is disabled. Disabled items cannot be interacted with and are skipped when navigating with the keyboard.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: A menu item that can be controlled and toggled like a radio button. It must be a child of a RadioGroup.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
